memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int n, const T *A, rocblas_int lda, T *invA, rocblas_int ldinvA)
memberdef.name: trtri_device

detaileddescription.para: trtri compute the inverse of a matrix A inv(A);

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.

rocblas_fill. specifies whether the upper 'rocblas_fill_upper' or lower 'rocblas_fill_lower' if rocblas_fill_upper, the lower part of A is not referenced if rocblas_fill_lower, the upper part of A is not referenced
rocblas_diagonal. = 'rocblas_diagonal_non_unit', A is non-unit triangular; = 'rocblas_diagonal_unit', A is unit triangular;
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int n, const T *A, rocblas_int lda, T *invA, rocblas_int ldinvA)
memberdef.name: custom_trtri_device
